com.movlad.pcl

Class PointCloud<PointT extends Point>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.pcl.nat.NativeObject
      • com.movlad.pcl.PointCloud<PointT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<PointT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalCloud, PointCloud3d

    public abstract class PointCloud<PointT extends Point>
extends NativeObject
implements java.lang.Iterable<PointT>, java.lang.Cloneable
    PointCloud represents the base class in PCL for storing collections of 3D points. The class is templated, which means you need to specify the type of data that it should contain.
    See Also:
    pcl::PointCloud documentation
